Name: Sergeant Shade
Description: Sergeant Shade is a venerable member of the WebtrES club, known for its rossoCorsa exterior and disciplined demeanor. This digital soldier has a screen that has seen many a battle in the virtual world, displaying the scars of skirmishes with elegance and pride. With arms and legs of the classic build, Sergeant Shade has a strong foundation in the fundamentals and an unwavering commitment to the club's cause. The shades are not just for style; they conceal a tactical mind always strategizing the next move in the quest for digital supremacy. Sergeant Shade doesn't just follow orders; it writes the code of conduct for the entire WebtrES battalion.
